description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37986):

1. Download the relevant update from the Windows Update catalog based on your system version.
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems: Use KB5040442.
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: Use KB5040442.
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: Use KB5040431.
   - For Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: Use KB5040448.

2. Apply the update by following these steps:
   - Navigate to Settings > Update & Security > Windows Update.
   - Check for updates and install the available updates.

3. Restart your system after installation to ensure that the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an integer underflow vulnerability that could allow a security feature bypass.
- Ensure you are using the appropriate update based on your operating system version. 
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.

For manual downloads, access the following links:
- [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
- [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
- [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
- [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
